document_data.mainbody:
Protection from any traps, 5 radius was a spell used by the Red Wizards of Thay.
When cast, this spell protected the caster from both magical and mechanical traps. It created a small area of protection around the caster,  in radius. This protected area moved with the caster. The spell was unable to detect the presence of a magical or mechanical trap.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, the spell required a material component, a small amount of axle grease.
